a game design methodology for the newsroom

About

The Newsgame Design Toolkit is a resource created to guide the development of newsgames, synthesizing tried and true methods from the game design process with the storytelling goals of news reporting. This was originally created by Stephen Suen as his final project for MAS.700.

Colophon

Logo icons by Lucas Almeida, Guillaume Berry, and baabullah hasan for The Noun Project.

Site built with Jekyll and Jeet and served via GitHub Pages. Text is set in Brandon Grotesque and served by Typekit.
